To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Segment of Cedarcrest shoes sponsored radio program Cedarcrest Jamboree, orginally broadcast January 10, year unknown, as stated on cue sheet and label. Featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Carl Smith (host ,announcer), Little Jimmy Dickens (performer), Hal Smith (performer), Johnny Sibert (performer), and Cowboy Copas (performer) on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
